articles.title: 'Very dangerous': Vietnam detects new UK-India 'hybrid' Covid-19 variant - AsiaOne
articles.description: Authorities in Vietnam have detected a new coronavirus variant that is a combination of the Indian and UK Covid-19 variants and spreads quickly by air, the health minister said on Saturday. After successfully containing the virus for most of last year, Vietna…

articles.author: The Star Online
articles.title: Lazada president Jessica Liu to leave Alibaba's Southeast Asia unit - The Star Online
articles.description: (Bloomberg) -- Jessica Liu, president of Lazada Group, is leaving the Southeast Asian online shopping unit of Alibaba Group Holding Ltd.

articles.title: The People's Association apologises for using couple's wedding photo for Hari Raya decorations without permission - AsiaOne
articles.description: SINGAPORE - The People's Association (PA) has apologised for using a wedding photograph of a Malay/Muslim couple as a standee for Hari Raya decorations at a Housing Board estate in Tiong Bahru, without permission. The PA has removed the standee. The photograp…
